title: DDFP 399: Week 8 preview & David Koechner
itunes:title: DDFP 399: Week 8 preview & David Koechner
description:
Shek is joined by LaVar Arrington, Erin Coscarelli and Elliot Harrison to make their Week 8 “Red Challenge Flag" picks, as well as discuss the famous "LaVar Leap" and the ethics of tackling players by their hair. Plus, David Koechner sits down with Shek to talk about the Kansas City Chiefs, the best referee hand signals and his upcoming film, "Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
